00026 CTxtMsgFromClient::CTxtMsgFromClient

00051 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 void CTxtMsgFromClient::DoDataExchange
00056     (
00057     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00058     )
00059 {
00060     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00061     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_CLIENTMSG_TXT_TIME, mOriginationTime );
00062     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_CLIENTMSG_TXT_MESSAGE, mMessageText );
00063     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_CLIENTMSG_TXT_ID, mMessageId );
00064 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
00065     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_CLIENTMSG_TXT_LINK_ID, mLinkId );
00066 #endif
00067 }
00068 
00069 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 BOOL CTxtMsgFromClient::OnInitDialog()
00079 {
00080     TCHAR               stringBuffer[200];
00081     time_type           localTime;
00082     date_time_data_type localDateTime;
00083     char                localTimeString[13];
00084 
00085     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00086 
00087     UTIL_convert_UTC_to_local( &mTextMessageEvent.origination_time, &localTime );
00088     UTIL_convert_seconds_to_time_type( &localTime, &localDateTime );
00089     UTIL_format_time_string( &localDateTime, localTimeString );
00090 
00091     MultiByteToWideChar( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, localTimeString, -1, stringBuffer, 13 );
00092     stringBuffer[13] = '\0';
00093     mOriginationTime.Format( _T(" %s"), stringBuffer );
00094 
00095     MultiByteToWideChar( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mTextMessageEvent.message_text, -1, stringBuffer, 200 );
00096     stringBuffer[199] = '\0';
00097     mMessageText.Format( _T(" %s"), stringBuffer );
00098     mMessageId.Format( _T(" %d"), mTextMessageEvent.message_id );
00099 
00100 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A607 )
00101     mLinkId = mTextMessageEvent.link_id.toCString( mCom.mClientCodepage );
00102 #endif
00103 
00104     UpdateData( FALSE );
00105 
00106     return TRUE;
00107 }    /* OnInitDialog() */
